text:
4 iPhone calendar features that not everyone knows
07 Nov 2019, 17:50 by Daria Gromova
Learn to use the standard application to the maximum.
The Calendar is one of the simplest standard iOS apps, but even it has hidden features. We talk about four functions that you might not know about.
Family calendar






Few people know about this, but when setting up family access, you also have a new calendar. It is displayed on the devices of all members of the group.
More precise time setting






Double-tap the minute counter - and it will switch from a 5-minute interval to a minute.
Weekly mode



It is enough to turn the smartphone in a horizontal position to open the weekly mode. So it‚Äôs much more convenient to view upcoming tasks and plan a schedule.
Event transfer



Have you changed plans? Just hold the event plate and drag it to a new time - instead of opening the settings and specifying everything manually.
Do you know any hidden iPhone calendar chips? Share in the comments!
